title: XoXo
text: I heard you do wierd things to your ships

title: Answer to purple idiot
text: I heard you do wierd thing to your men

title: Hey Fulgrin
text: Come look at this model I painted

title: The Blessed Machine
text:
From the moment I understood the weakness of my flesh, it disgusted me.
I craved the strength and certainty of steel.
I aspired to the purity of the Blessed Machine.
Your kind cling to your flesh, as though it will not decay and fail you.
One day the crude biomass you call the temple will wither, and you will beg my kind to save you.
But I am already saved, for the Machine is immortal…
Even in death I serve the Omnissiah.
